text: 8.3 Apo 13.38-39, 15.10, Lom 3.20, 2 Ko 5.21, Plp 2.7, Hib 4.15, 7.18-19 Binɨb mubwak gos nab nedil ayaŋ, kɨles mɨdɨl takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lup. Anɨb ak tek takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨlop gek, tap si tap tɨmel gep ak kelɨgɨnɨgel tek ma lup. Pen binɨb tep ma mɨdebal tek, takaw anɨb ak ag dad amɨl, mɨdtep gɨnɨgel tek ma lek, God ne gak. Ne Ñɨne ke agyokek, apɨl bɨ sɨlokɨl, binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal tek bɨ yɨbɨl lak. Ne tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal ak dɨyokɨnɨgayn agɨl, apɨl mubwak ne ke ñak. Anɨgek, God ne tap si tap tɨmel gep kɨles ak gek, pɨsnep apyap pakak.
